```{r,include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```


```{r}
#glimpse(house_elections)
#glimpse(candidates)
#glimpse(committees)
#glimpse(contributions)

# Filter out the candidate data that is only for 2008 elections 
# Change the "REP" and "DEM" to "R" and "D" respectively
candidate_2008 <- candidates %>%
  filter(cand_election_yr == 2008) %>%
  mutate(cand_party_affiliation = gsub("REP", "R", cand_party_affiliation),
         cand_party_affiliation = gsub("DEM", "D", cand_party_affiliation))

# Filter out all contribution that is "Independent expenditure advocating election of candidate"
contributions_2008 <- contributions %>%
  filter(transaction_type == "24E")
```
